titles.title: A bill to amend the Shivwits Band of the Paiute Indian Tribe of Utah Water Rights Settlement Act to establish an acquisition fund for the water rights and habitat acquisition program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported by Senator McCain without amendment. With written report No. 109-291.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 531.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.

bill.summary: 11/13/2006--Passed Senate amended. Amends the Shivwits Band of the Paiute Indian Tribe of Utah Water Rights Settlement Act to establish in the Treasury the Santa Clara Water Rights and Habitat Acquisition Fund for the water rights and habitat acquisition program in the Santa Clara and Virgin River Basins. Transfers to the Fund any funds made available under such Act, but not expended, for the water rights and habitat acquisition program.
